text: Xinyue Club "Privacy Protection Guide
Update date: January 18, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Effective date: January 18, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: hint

In order to fully protect your rights, we have updated the "Xinyue Club> Privacy Protection Guide". The key content of this version of the update is mainly concentrated in Chapter 1 "the information we collect and use".
label: Policy Change

text: According to the actual situation of this service, we have adjusted the statement of copywriting, and more detailedly told you that the business scenario and purpose of collecting your personal information.
label: Policy Change

text: overview
You are welcome to choose from Tencent (hereinafter referred to as "we".

The Tencent Company in this guidelines specifically refers to Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd., a provider of Xinyue Club and its service providers."Xinyue Club" (hereinafter referred to as "Xinyue Club" or "this product")!

In addition to "Tencent Privacy Policy" and "Tencent Software License and Service Agreement", we will also further refine it to youCollect, use, store, and share personal information, as well as related rights you enjoy.

This guideline is an integral part of the Tencent Software License and Service Agreement. In addition to the other instructions, the noun definition in this guidelines has the same meaning as the Tencent Software License and Service Agreement.
The main points of this guideline are as follows:

• In order to provide you with services such as information reading, equity collection and purchase, game downloads, we need to collect your equipment information, account information, Tencent game product log information, etc.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your equipment information, account information, Tencent game product log information, etc. to provide you with information reading, equity collection and other services.

text: • You can manage your personal information and related authorization according to this guideline.
label: Edit/Control

text: • We use multi -directional security protection measures to ensure that your personal information protection is at a reasonable level of security.
label: Data Security

text: If you are under the age of 18, please read this agreement and other above agreements with the accompaniment of the legal guardian.
label: Specific Audiences

text: Products or services.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are a child under the age of 14, please read the privacy policy carefully and help you complete the product or service registration process.

text: You can understand the full version of the "Xinyue Club> Privacy Protection Guide" to understand the more detailed personal information processing rules such as the corresponding relationship between the type of personal information and the purpose.
1. The information we collect and use

In the process of using this product service, we will collect the information that you actively provide or because of the service provided by the service as follows to provide you with your services and ensure your account security:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1.1, when you register or use this product service, we will collect your network identity identification information and personal common equipment information for users who are your products.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your network identity identification information and personal common equipment information for users who marked your products.

text: If you use WeChat, QQ and (or) other account numbers (hereinafter referred to as "third -party accounts") as the Xinyue Club account to log in to this product, we will collect the unique logo of your WeChat, QQ and third -party accounts,Avatar, nickname, used to save your login information so that you can log in at different devices.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When logging in with a third -party account, collect the unique logo, avatar, and nickname of your third -party account to save your login information.

text: If you use WeChat, QQ, and (or) third -party accounts as the Xinyue Club account to log in to this product, in order to provide you with services and improve the product experience, we will collect your QQ number, WeChat account or other accounts we recognizeThe unique logo, nickname, avatars, and other information you authorize, as well as your related operation information in this product, can be displayed to you or other users or friends.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When logging in to this product with a third -party account, collect the unique logo, avatar, nickname, nickname, and operational information in this product.

text: You can also choose information such as gender, region, age, birthday, personality signature and other information according to your personal social display.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can fill in information such as gender, region, age, birthday, personalized signature.

text: We may provide you with relevant permissions depending on the specific situation of the product so that you can set the relevant information about whether the relevant information described before.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can set the corresponding settings of information such as gender, region, age, birthday, personalized signature and other information.

text: 1.2, in order to ensure your normal use of our service, maintain the normal operation of the basic functions of the product, optimize product performance, improve your experience and ensure your account security, we will collect and use your device model, equipment name, system version version, system version version, system version version, IP address, device recognition symbols (such as Androidid, MAC address), hardware serial number (device SN), login IP address, network type and other information.
label: Data Security
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect and use your device model, device name, system version, IP address, device recognition symbol, hardware serial number, login IP address, network type, etc. to maintain product operation and ensure account security.

text: 1.3, in order to ensure the stable operation of the Xinyue Club and achieve specific functions, we may access the software development package (SDK) provided by a third party, and may share your personal information to these SDK providers during the SDK operation process(View third -party SDK directory).
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information

text: 1.4, when you use this product service, we will collect your log information, such as logging in the log, so that you can view your use of history in this product, and at the same time used for product operation statistical analysis, customer service complaint processing, and other otherProduct safety analysis.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your log information so that you can view the use of historical records, product operation statistical analysis, customer service complaint processing, etc.

First Party Collection Information

text: 1.6, when you use this product service process and participate in activities involving physical rewards, we will ask you to fill in personal information such as personal names, mobile phone numbers, and contact addresses in order to distribute the content of the event reward.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you distribute physical rewards for you, collect your personal name, mobile phone number, contact address and other personal information.

First Party Collection Information

label: Data Retention
Important

text: After the previous period expires, we will delete or treat your personal information.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: After exceeding the storage period, your personal information will be deleted or anonymous.

Cessation of Operations

text: 3. Information security
3.1 Safety protection measures
We strive to provide protection for users' information security to prevent information leakage, loss, improper use, unauthorized access and disclosure.
label: Data Security

text: We use multi -directional security protection measures to ensure that user personal information protection is at a reasonable level of security, including technological protection methods, management system control, and security system guarantee.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We use technical protection methods, management system control, security system guarantee and many aspects to protect personal information.

text: We use industry -leading technical protection measures.
label: Data Security

text: The technical means we use include but not limited to firewalls, encryption (such as SSL), de -identification or anonymous treatment, access control measures, etc.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Use technologies such as firewalls, encryption, de -identification or anonymous processing, access control measures, etc. to protect your information.

text: In addition, we will continue to strengthen the security capabilities of software installed on your device.
label: Data Security

text: For example, we will complete some information encryption work locally to consolidate security transmission;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Complete some information encryption work locally.

text: We will understand the application information and running process information installed by your device to prevent malicious programs such as viruses and Trojans.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Understand the application information of the device and the process information of the operation to prevent malicious procedures.

text: We have established a special management system, process and organization that guarantees personal information security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Establish a special management system, process and organization that guarantees personal information security.

text: For example, we strictly restrict the scope of the personnel of the access information, require them to abide by the confidentiality obligations and audit, and those who violate the obligations will be punished in accordance with regulations.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Strictly restrict the scope of the personnel who access information, and sign a confidentiality agreement with them to punish those who violate the obligations of confidentiality.

text: We will also review the management system, process and organization to prevent unauthorized personnel from accessing, using or disclosing users' information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The review management system, process and organization to prevent information about unauthorized access, use or disclosure of users.

text: We recommend that you pay full attention to the protection of personal information when using products and services, and we will also provide multiple security functions to help you protect your personal information security.
label: Data Security

text: 3.2 Safety event disposal measures
If personal information leaks and other security incidents occur, we will start emergency plans to prevent security incidents from expanding.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will start emergency plans to deal with personal information security incidents.

text: After the security incident occurs, we will inform you the basic situation of the security incident in the form of announcement, push notification or email, we are about or already adopted, and our proposals for your response.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will inform your basic situation, possible impact, disposal measures, independent prevention suggestions, etc.

text: If it is difficult to achieve one by one, we will issue warnings through announcement and other methods.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If it is difficult to achieve one by one, we will issue warnings through announcement and other methods.

text: 6. Your rights

During your use of this product service, we may provide you with the corresponding operation settings according to the specific situation of this product so that you can inquire, copy, delete, correct, supplement or withdraw your relevant personal information. rewrite: You can set up query, copy, delete, correct, supplement or withdraw your relevant personal information through the corresponding operation settings. See the specific guidance of the product for details.

text: In addition, we have set up a channel for feedback, and your opinions will be dealt with in a timely manner.
label: Edit/Control

text: 6.1 Personal information collection and use rules query

You can specify the interface in this product at any time to view the collection and use rules of personal information at any time, including but not limited to this guideline, the "Third -Party Information Sharing List", and the use of sensitivity permissions and authorization of the product.
label: Edit/Control

text: Please know and understand that the service and corresponding personal information collection and usage in this guideline may be different because of factors such as the equipment models and system versions you choose.
label: Edit/Control

text: 6.2 Personal information query, correction
1), you can query and access your account basic information (account avatar, nickname, and other personal information that you choose to fill in in this productUse information.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: In the [My Information], [Personal Information Query] or other designated pages, query and access your account basic information and other use information.

text: 2) If you have other needs for personal information inquiry, replication, correction, and supplementation, you can also contact us through the contact information described in Article 9 of this guideline.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can contact us other applications about personal information inquiry, replication, correction, and supplement.

text: But please note that when you contact us to apply for personal information rights response, in order to ensure account number and personal information security, we may verify your identity and account security status.
label: Important
Data Security
Edit/Control
rewrite: When you contact us to apply for personal information rights response, we will verify your identity and account security status.

text: We will support your reasonable request.
label: Edit/Control

text: But under the situation of our personal information storage scope, exceeding the reasonable limit, or response to your request, we may not be able to respond to your application in the case of serious damage to your or other third -party legitimate rights and interests.
label: Important
Data Security
Edit/Control
rewrite: We may not be able to respond to requests that exceed the storage range, exceed the reasonable limit, or the legitimate rights and interests of personal information subjects or other individuals and organizations will be seriously damaged.

text: 6.3 Personal information display and sharing
1), your account basic information (avatar, nickname) will be displayed on your personal homepage, guild or related functions you participate in.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: Your account basic information will be displayed on personal homepages, guilds or related functions.

text: 2), the information you uploaded or published in this product, or the information you actively shared, will display the users within the range of the release or shared.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: The information you uploaded or posted by yourself will be displayed.

text: 3) When you authorize third parties to obtain your information in this product, the third party will disclose your relevant information to you or other users of the third party within your authorization range.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: Third parties can disclose your information within the scope of authorization after obtaining the information you authorized.

text: For specific display rules and public scope settings, please pay attention to the rules of the third -party platform.
6.4 Personal information collection and use of authorization changes

You can change the equipment permissions obtained by deleting information, closing or opening specific product functions, closing or opening a specific product acquisition (the specific permissions are different due to the different equipment models and system versions used by the user).Scope of authorization
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: The scope of authorization can be changed by deleting information, closing or turning on specific product functions, closing or turning on the device obtained by specific products.

text: After withdrawing authorization, you may not be able to use the authorized product function, but do not affect the use of other functions.
label: Edit/Control

text: You withdraw authorization will not affect the effectiveness of personal information processing activities based on your authorization before withdrawal.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: Withdrawal authorization will not affect the collection and use of information based on authorization.

text: Some personal information collection and use of the basic functions corresponding to our services. If you want to withdraw the authorization of relevant personal information collection and use may cause us to be unable to provide you with services. In this case, if you still want to withdraw the relevant authorization, you can pass it throughApply for account cancellation to achieve the demand.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: If the authorization of the withdrawal of basic functions, if the service cannot be provided, the relevant authorization may be withdrawn by canceling the account.

text: For example, based on laws and regulations, real -name authentication must be performed using game services. If you want to withdraw the authorization of our collection of real -name authentication information, we require us to delete your real -name authentication information. We may not be able to continue to provide you with basic service products.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: The authorization of the withdrawal collection of real -name authentication information requires deleting real -name authentication information to cause the unable to continue to provide basic services.

text: 6.5 Account Logging out
You can apply for account cancellation in this product [Settings]-[Logging out the account] interface.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: In [Settings]-[Logging out] The interface is applied for account cancellation.

text: When you apply for account cancellation, we will verify your identity, account security status, and cancellation conditions. For details, please read the instructions in the product cancellation process carefully and the "Account Logging out Agreement".
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: When you apply for account cancellation, we will verify your identity, account security status, and cancellation conditions.

text: After completing the account cancellation, in addition to laws and regulations or this agreement, your personal information under this account will be deleted or anonymous, and the related products and services that have previously related to the account will no longer be related.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: After canceling, the personal information under the account will be deleted or anonymous and no longer associates with related products and services.

text: Once the account is canceled, it will not be recovered, please do it carefully
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: Once the cancellation is completed, it will not be restored.

text: 7. Change
We may revise this guidelines in a timely manner.
label: Policy Change

text: When the terms of this guideline change, we will prompt you the guidance after the version is updated in an appropriate manner.
label: Policy Change

text: Please read the content of the privacy protection or guidelines carefully after the change. You continue to use this product to indicate that you agree to collect, process or use your personal information according to the updated privacy protection guidelines.
label: Policy Change
Important
Risk
rewrite: Continue to use this product to represent the guidance of the updated privacy protection.

text: 8. Minor protection
We attach great importance to the protection of personal information of minors and continue to explore better personal information protection methods of minors.
label: Specific Audiences

text: According to the relevant laws and regulations, if you are a minor under the age of 18, you should obtain the consent of your parents or legal guardians before using Tencent's service.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Minors under the age of 18 should obtain the consent of the guardian before use.

text: In particular, if you are a child under the age of 14, you should help you complete the product or service registration process by your parents or the legal guardian so that you can use the products or services we provide.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are a child under the age of 14, please use products or services under the consent and guidance of the guardian.

text: If you are the guardian of minors, when you help children complete the registration and use of products or services, you should carefully read this guideline and the "Child Privacy Protection Statement", decide whether to agree with this guideline and the "Child Privacy Protection Statement".Help minors register and use so that they can use the products or services we provide.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: The guardian should read and use the policy carefully before helping children complete the registration and use of products or services.

text: If you have relevant questions or claims for personal information protection of the minor information you monitor, please contact us through the contact information disclosed in part 7 in the "Child Privacy Protection Statement".
label: Specific Audiences

text: We will deal with and reply to you within a reasonable time.
9. Others
"Tencent Privacy Policy" is a general privacy clause for Tencent's unified applicable. The content stipulated in it includes but not limited to user rights and information security measures.
For example, the "Tencent Privacy Policy" is inconsistent or contradictory with this guideline, please refer to this guideline.
"Child Privacy Protection Statement" is a personal information protection rule for children under 14 years of age.

Within the scope of the "Child Privacy Protection Statement", such as the "Tencent Privacy Policy" and this guideline are inconsistent or contradictory, please refer to the "Child Privacy Protection Statement".
10. Contact us

We have set up a special person in personal information protection team and personal information protection person. If you have any questions or complaints or suggestions on the privacy policy or personal information protection related matters, you can contact us in the following ways:

Contact Information
